verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: held] [ARG1: a " Make America Great Again " campaign - style rally] [ARGM-LOC: in Washington , Michigan] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday night] [ARGM-TMP: while journalists were at the White Hous]
